page.title: 11Playground Games (cont)
page.content: In the game ice_cream five or six people line up at the end of the playground, One person stands at the other end with their back facing the chilren.They have to try and tag him without him seeing them.He will turn around at any time to see if the other children are moving. When he does this the children have to stand still. If he sees them moving he changes places and then the game carries on. The first to get to him without being caught shouts "Icecream" and the rest of the children have to run back up the playground. If he tags anyone then they take his place and the game starts again.
